title: Self-Reflection and Community Growth Through Transformative Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social structures and civic consciousness
context.additional_context: Project-based activities addressing social change and the use of digital collaboration tools tailored for office/administrative working learners

learning_goals: Can explain three or more ways personal values influence social contexts through self-reflection
Can execute one or more collaboratively designed social problem-solving projects with peers using digital collaboration tools
Can document personal learning growth through formative assessments and record reflections in a journal five or more times
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
